name: Transport Oil Truck Driver Sim
description: Offroad cargo truck fuel transport or mountain oil transport truck simulator game is extreme driving game in which you will experience the uphill driving with oil tanker. The main objective of cargo truck transport driver game is to transport oil to the multiple fuel stations by driving on mountain hill roads. Be careful while you are on the duty of oil delivery and transport high flammable gasoline safely to the offroad gas stations. Provide cargo oil to the army base construction sites and avoid heavy off road traffic accidents as cargo truck driver transporter. Run 4x4 heavy truck loaders and fulfill the needs of the city in cargo truck transporter driver games. Be the truck master in cargo truck simulator games and take responsibility of supply oil and fuel to the multiple patrol stations. You have cargo and transport only oil to the city no other cargo transport like jeep, SUV, cars, monster 4wd army jeeps etc. Be the real heavy race trucker in free truck games 2018.
